DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical trial study safety efficacy investigational imaging agent delineation/visualization urologic anatomy set minimally invasive surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Dose-escalation Study Contrast Agent Delineation Urological Anatomy Minimally Invasive Surgery
DOC.criteria: Provide write informed consent prior initiation study procedure Are > 18 year age Women consent undergo standard care minimally invasive pelvic surgery ( traditional laparoscopy robotic surgery ) Women expect admitted hospital follow surgery least 24 hour Are unwilling unable provide inform consent . Are unwilling unable comply requirement protocol . History prior urologic surgery . History prior pelvic surgery . History known retroperitoneal fibrosis . Have follow screen laboratory value : Hemoglobin ≤ 8.0 g/dL ; Absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) ≤ 1500/μL ; Platelet count ≤ 100,000/μL ; Serum creatinine ≥ 1.5 x institutional upper limit normal ( IULN ) creatinine ; Serum bilirubin ≥ 1.5 x IULN ; Aspartate transaminase ( AST serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase , SGOT ) ≥ 2x IULN ; • Alanine transaminase ( ALT serum glutamate pyruvate transaminase , SGPT ) ≥ 2 x IULN . Females pregnant , lactating , breastfeed ; Any condition , Investigator 's judgment , would potentially compromise study compliance ability evaluate safety efficacy .
